description: Aruncus 'Misty Lace' is a stunning plant species with delicate white flowers and lacy foliage. The flowers bloom from late spring to early summer, adding color and texture to the garden. It is an adaptable shrub that requires minimal care and maintenance. It prefers full to part sun, and thrives in moist, loamy soils. Its distinctive lacy foliage is accentuated by upright panicles of white flowers, creating a graceful garden specimen. This low maintenance, shade tolerant perennial can grow in a variety of soil conditions and does not require much pruning or fertilizing. It provides color and texture all season, making it an attractive addition to any landscape.
